title: Cocktail (Captioned)
creator_credit: Roger Donaldson, Robert W. Court, Ted Field, Interscope, Silver Screen Pictures and Touchstone
brief_description: When a young, confident and ambitious bartender moves to Jamaica he meets an artist and their romance brings a new perspective to his self-centered life. Stars Tom Cruise and Bryan Brown.
